body:
A professional counsellor can help you understand issues such as:

- how to reduce emotional stress
- the effect disputes have on your children
- why your relationship with the other parent ended

[Contact the Samaritans](http://www.samaritans.org/how-we-can-help-you/contact-us) if you need to speak to someone urgently.
cost_description: Cost based on a 50-minute session. Fees may vary depending on your location and the experience of the counsellor. Some counsellors offer reductions if you’re unemployed or on a low income.
heading: Counselling
